txt.en:
'The tale of your deeds grows ever longer and more full of glory, [placeholder], and your assistance during the great battles of Moria must surely be one of the most notable!

'Your aid proved invaluable during the Battle of the Deep-way, friend [placeholder], when hope seemed to be lost. But it was not so, and you helped the defenders to carry the day!

'If ever you wish to revisit the desperation and horror of that battle, you should peer into the Reflecting Pool. War with the Orcs is dangerous and difficult, but there is honour and glory to be had there too.'
'I am happy that you have revisited your defence of the Deep-way, [placeholder]. Only by studying our past can we gain knowledge to aid our future.'
'Look into the Reflecting Pool and meditate upon your past deeds....'
II.5.5 Tale: The Battle of the Deep-way
Rúnar, a Sage of Moria, has invited you to recollect your experience defending the Deep-way from attack by Mazog's Orcs.
Peer into the Reflecting Pool and revisit 'The Battle of the Deep-way'
The Reflecting Pool in the Twenty-first Hall of Moria will allow you to revisit 'The Battle of the Deep-way.'\n\nA Sage of Moria has challenged you to revisit the Battle of the Deep-way.
Rúnar, a Sage of Moria, can be found in the Twenty-first Hall of Moria.\n\nA Sage of Moria is waiting to speak with you about what you have learned by revisiting the Battle of the Deep-way.
